name: Quantum Shooter
description:
Submission to BOOOM! The 3rd GameShell Game Jam (2019Q3), finished within 10 hours (as I only discovered the jam in the last few days and already had other commitment...) But I am glad that i made something playable within this time!

This game is inspired by the famous polarity shoot 'em up Ikaruga. The code used in this game were heavily borrowed from fellow PICO-8 games: A PICO-8 Spaceshooter in 16 GIFs and MONOID. Due to the short time, I didn't make much content and the game over effect is buggy.
